title: [JP Server]Certain champ alternate skin sounds not properly playing on ability cast
body:
Hello Rito Gaems, I'm GigaBreaker88. A friend managed to give me a beta key to the JP server, and I took Yasuo into a custom game with the High Noon skin for the hell of it. I noticed right away my Q used the default skin sound, without the noticable "bang" it's supposed to. Interestingly, the sound plays properly for the PROJECT skin. Afterwards, I tested it with Jhin's High Noon skin as well, because why not? His sounds worked just fine. I have an exam in an hour or so and I just wanted to do a quick test, but there's a clear bug going on here, replicable 10/10 times on Yasuo. I suspect it may have something to do with his Q sound being tied to his voice going off on cast? No way to be sure. 

For reference, my IGN on the beta JP server is "Giga" if you need it for anything.

replies.body:
Hey GigaBreaker88 - 

We're aware of an issue where High Noon Yasuo's Q isn't properly playing - it's not related to VO, just the skill in general.  Thanks for the report!

Sorry to hijack, but I wasn't able to get any help from the Japan server side when I submitted a ticket. Do you know why the Japanese server is being blocked off regionally? Only certain countries can currently login. I work in Korea, and I was pretty excited about being able to play, but due to the IP block, I can't get in without a VPN. Another person from the Philippines told me they had the same issue.
It's intended that for now, it's only for players located in Japan. IP addresses that aren't from Japan will be blocked at this time.
